text: Va caro ʙar Alloh tavakkal nakunem va hol on ki U rohi nacoti moro ʙa mo nison dod? Va ʙar ozorhoe, ki sumo ʙar mo merasoned (ʙa saʙaʙi da'vatamon sumoro ʙa jaktoparasti) alʙatta, saʙr xohem kard va tavakkalkunandagon ʙar Alloh tavvakkal mekunand va ammo kase ki kofir ʙosad, sarparastas sajton ast»
